TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ViewStructure extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: ViewStructure is a container for storing additional per-view data generated by View#onProvideStructure View.onProvideStructure and View#onProvideAutofillStructure View.onProvideAutofillStructure.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void SetDimens (int left, int top, int scrollX, int scrollY, int width, int height);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDimens(int32 left, int32 top, int32 scrollX, int32 scrollY, int32 width, int32 height) cil managed
abstract member SetDimens : int * int * int * int * int * int -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: viewStructure.SetDimens (left, top, scrollX, scrollY, width, height)

Docs.param: The view's left position, in pixels relative to its parent's left edge.
The view's top position, in pixels relative to its parent's top edge.
How much the view's x coordinate space has been scrolled, in pixels.
How much the view's y coordinate space has been scrolled, in pixels.
The view's visible width, in pixels. This is the width visible on screen, not the total data width of a scrollable view.
The view's visible height, in pixels. This is the height visible on screen, not the total data height of a scrollable view.
Docs.summary: Set the basic dimensions of this view.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
